entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming south 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
